0000100010111001 0101100111010111 0 -> sum: 0110001010010000, cout: 0
0000101001001011 1000101011001100 0 -> sum: 1001010100010111, cout: 0

0111011101101101 0011011010100101 0 -> sum: 1010111000010010, cout: 0
0001111111110100 0011110110000100 0 -> sum: 0101110101111000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
